Title: Vendor Master Creation
WhatIsIt: Vendor master stores supplier information such as name, address, payment terms, tax details, and bank accounts.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Required to procure goods, process vendor invoices, and make payments in real business scenarios.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Navigate to Procurement and Sourcing > Vendors > All Vendors > New. Select vendor group, enter vendor details, configure payment terms, tax group, and save.

Title: Purchase Order Creation
WhatIsIt: Purchase Order is a legally binding document issued to vendors for purchasing goods or services.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Controls procurement spending, commits vendors to deliver goods, and integrates inventory and finance.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Go to Procurement and Sourcing > Purchase Orders > All Purchase Orders > New. Select vendor, add purchase lines, quantities, prices, delivery dates, and save.

Title: Purchase Order Workflow
WhatIsIt: Workflow enables approval of purchase orders based on amount, category, or department rules.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Prevents unauthorized purchases and ensures compliance and audit control.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Configure workflow in Procurement and Sourcing > Setup > Procurement workflows. Submit PO for approval and wait for approval.

Title: Purchase Order Confirmation
WhatIsIt: Purchase Order confirmation sends the finalized order to the vendor.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Confirms commitment with the vendor and freezes critical fields.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Open Purchase Order > Confirm > OK. System generates confirmation document.

Title: Product Receipt Posting
WhatIsIt: Product receipt records the physical receipt of goods against a purchase order.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Updates inventory stock in real time and enables invoice matching.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Open Purchase Order > Receive > Product Receipt. Enter received quantity and post.

Title: Inventory Item Creation
WhatIsIt: Items represent products or materials that are stocked, purchased, or sold.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Foundation for inventory tracking, costing, procurement, and sales.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Go to Product Information Management > Released Products > New. Define item number, item model group, storage and tracking dimensions.

Title: Inventory Model Group
WhatIsIt: Inventory model group defines how inventory value is calculated such as FIFO, Weighted Average, or Standard Cost.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Ensures accurate inventory valuation and financial reporting.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Navigate to Inventory Management > Setup > Inventory > Model Groups. Create model group and assign to item.

Title: Vendor Invoice Processing
WhatIsIt: Vendor invoice records the bill received from the vendor for delivered goods or services.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Enables liability recognition, cost accounting, and vendor payment processing.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Accounts Payable > Invoices > Invoice Journal > New. Match with PO, validate, and post.

Title: Three Way Matching
WhatIsIt: Three-way matching compares purchase order, product receipt, and vendor invoice.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Prevents overbilling and ensures invoice accuracy.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Enable invoice matching policy in Accounts Payable > Setup. System validates automatically during invoice posting.

Title: Customer Master Creation
WhatIsIt: Customer master stores billing, payment, and tax details for customers.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Required to create sales orders and post customer invoices.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Accounts Receivable > Customers > All Customers > New. Enter customer details, payment terms, and save.

Title: Sales Order Creation
WhatIsIt: Sales order records customer demand for goods or services.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Drives revenue generation and delivery commitments.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Sales and Marketing > Sales Orders > All Sales Orders > New. Select customer and add items.

Title: Sales Order Confirmation
WhatIsIt: Sales order confirmation formally commits order details to the customer.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Improves customer communication and demand planning.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Open Sales Order > Confirm > OK.

Title: Packing Slip Posting
WhatIsIt: Packing slip records the shipment of goods to the customer.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Updates inventory and prepares order for invoicing.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Sales Order > Pick and Pack > Packing Slip.

Title: Customer Invoice Posting
WhatIsIt: Customer invoice records revenue and accounts receivable.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Ensures correct revenue recognition and customer balance updates.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Sales Order > Invoice > Post.

Title: General Ledger Setup
WhatIsIt: General Ledger defines the chart of accounts and financial structure.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Foundation for all financial postings and reporting.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: General Ledger > Chart of Accounts > Main Accounts > New. Define account structure.

Title: Journal Entry Posting
WhatIsIt: Journal entries record manual or automated financial transactions.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Ensures accurate accounting and audit trail.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: General Ledger > Journal Entries > New Journal > Lines > Post.

Title: Bank Account Setup
WhatIsIt: Bank accounts store organizational bank details.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Required for payments, receipts, and reconciliations.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Cash and Bank Management > Bank Accounts > New. Enter bank details and save.

Title: Bank Reconciliation
WhatIsIt: Bank reconciliation matches bank statements with system transactions.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Prevents financial discrepancies and fraud.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Cash and Bank Management > Reconcile > Bank Reconciliation.

Title: Project Creation
WhatIsIt: Projects track costs and revenues for project-based work.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Supports project costing, billing, and profitability analysis.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Project Management > Projects > New. Configure project type and funding.

Title: Human Resource Worker Creation
WhatIsIt: Worker records store employee personal and employment information.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Required for payroll, benefits, and compliance.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Human Resources > Workers > New. Enter worker and employment details.

Title: Fixed Asset Creation
WhatIsIt: Fixed assets represent long-term company-owned assets.
WhyUsefulRealTime: Enables depreciation and asset lifecycle tracking.
HowToCreateOrConfigure: Asset Management > Fixed Assets > New. Assign asset group and acquisition value.
